17 namespace tsa {
18 
19  NotchWidrow::NotchWidrow(unsigned int channels, Dmatrix& FrequencyList, double C)
20  :
21  mFrequencyList(FrequencyList),
22  mWeight1(channels, FrequencyList.size1()),
23  mWeight2(channels, FrequencyList.size1()),
24  mX1(FrequencyList.size1()),
25  mX2(FrequencyList.size1()),
26  mCs(FrequencyList.size1()),
27  mSn(FrequencyList.size1()),
28  mlstart(0.0),
29  mAmp(C) {
30  }
31 
32  NotchWidrow::~NotchWidrow() {
33  }
34 
35  void NotchWidrow::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& CleanedData) {
36  Dmatrix* arg1 = InputData.GetData();
37  Dmatrix* arg2 = CleanedData.GetData();
38 
39  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
40  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
41  arg2->clear();
42  LogWarning("NotchWidrow: resizing output array");
43  }
44  CleanedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
45  CleanedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
46  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
47 
48  }
49 
50  void NotchWidrow::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& CleanedData, SeqViewDouble& ReferenceSignal) {
51  Dmatrix* arg1 = InputData.GetData();
52  Dmatrix* arg2 = CleanedData.GetData();
53  Dmatrix* arg3 = ReferenceSignal.GetData();
54 
55  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
56  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
57  arg2->clear();
58  LogWarning("NotchWidrow: resizing output array");
59  }
60  CleanedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
61  CleanedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
62  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
63 
64  arg3->resize(mFrequencyList.size1(), arg1->size2());
65  ReferenceSignal.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
66  ReferenceSignal.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
67  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mFrequencyList.size1(); i++) {
68  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < arg1->size2(); j++)
69  ReferenceSignal(i, j) = mRefSign(i, j);
70  }
71  }
72 
73  void NotchWidrow::execute(Dmatrix& Input, Dmatrix& Output) {
74  mRefSign.resize(mFrequencyList.size1(), Input.size2());
75 
76  if (Input.size1() != mWeight1.size1()) {
77  mWeight1.resize(Input.size1(), mFrequencyList.size1(), true);
78  mWeight1.clear();
79  mWeight2.resize(Input.size1(), mFrequencyList.size1(), true);
80  mWeight2.clear();
81  LogWarning("NotchWidrow: number of channels changed, weight reset");
82  }
83 
84  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mFrequencyList.size1(); j++) {
85  mX1(j) = mAmp * cos(mlstart * 2.0 * M_PI * mFrequencyList(j, 0));
86  mX2(j) = mAmp * sin(mlstart * 2.0 * M_PI * mFrequencyList(j, 0));
87  mCs(j) = cos(2.0 * M_PI * mFrequencyList(j, 0));
88  mSn(j) = sin(2.0 * M_PI * mFrequencyList(j, 0));
89  }
90 
91  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < Input.size2(); l++) {
92  for (unsigned int channel = 0; channel < Input.size1(); channel++) {
93 
94  Output(channel, l) = Input(channel, l);
95  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mFrequencyList.size1(); j++) {
96  mRefSign(j, l) = mWeight1(channel, j) * mX1(j) + mWeight2(channel, j) * mX2(j);
97  Output(channel, l) -= mRefSign(j, l);
98  }
99 
100  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mFrequencyList.size1(); j++) {
101  mWeight1(channel, j) = mWeight1(channel, j) + 2.0 * mFrequencyList(j, 1) * Output(channel, l) * mX1(j);
102  mWeight2(channel, j) = mWeight2(channel, j) + 2.0 * mFrequencyList(j, 1) * Output(channel, l) * mX2(j);
103  }
104  }
105  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mFrequencyList.size1(); j++) {
106  double x1_tmp = mCs(j) * mX1(j) - mSn(j) * mX2(j);
107  double x2_tmp = mSn(j) * mX1(j) + mCs(j) * mX2(j);
108  mX1(j) = x1_tmp;
109  mX2(j) = x2_tmp;
110  }
111  }
112  mlstart += Input.size2();
113  }

119  NotchWidrow::NotchWidrow(const NotchWidrow& from) {
120  }

131  return * this;
132  }
